span.style: color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 700; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

p.span: Want to view your child’s report card?

span.style: color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

p.span: Welcome to the Camden City School District

span.style: color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 700; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

p.span: page! The Genesis Parent/Student Portal tool is a safe, secure way to view your child’s school record for the current school year. You will gain access to your child’s grades, conduct records, attendance and homework assignments.

span.style: color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 700; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

p.span: -Contact your school’s FOC by clicking on your child’s school here:

p.style: padding: 0pt 0pt 12pt; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

span.style: color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

p.span: Once you submit your information, the Parent Portal school administrator will email you the username and password needed to access the Parent Portal. Each designated student household will receive a single Genesis login username and password. If you do not receive this email within 2-3 business days, or if you have any questions/concerns,

span.style: color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span:
please email your school’s FOC by selecting your child’s school above.
Moving? Have a new email address? Please be sure to keep your contact information up-to-date. Please click here for information about how parents/guardians can manage their contact information in the Genesis Parent Portal, or you can contact your school’s FOC.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

p.span: Already have a parent or student portal account? To access the Parent or Student Portal,
